T02D1697:53a-3: me tog phreng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1697:53a-4: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1697:53a-5: lha dang lha min nor lha'i cod pan ston ka'i
T02D1697:53a-6: nyi 'od 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis zhabs kyi rdul la
T02D1697:53a-7: reg / rnyog med gzigs pa'i shes rab mig ni
T02D1697:53a-8: snying rje'i rlan gyis rab tu gang zhing nyon mongs
T02D1697:53a-9: dra ba gcod // rmongs pa'i mthu yis srid pa'i
T02D1697:53a-10: mtsho chen mi zad skye 'chi'i dba' rgal drag pos
T02D1697:53a-12: skyob pa'i gzings chen dri med gzugs mdzes dpal gyi
T02D1697:53a-13: snying po me tog phreng 'dzin de la bdag phyag
T02D1697:53a-14: 'tshal // gang zhig spros bral mkha' ltar dag pa'i dbyings su ro gcig pa //
T02D1697:53a-15: bsam gtan sprin med aa sogs yi ges snying gar rab brgyan cing //
T02D1697:53a-16: gus pa'i sbyor bas sna tshogs mthu ldan yon tan rin chen gter //
T02D1697:53a-17: drang srong tshe 'dzin bla ma'i gsung las bdag gis 'dir brjod bya //
T02D1697:53a-18: rab tu zhi la dga' ba'i bden 'dzin nags tshal lam //
T02D1697:53a-19: g-yeng ba'i rdul bral phug gam ljon shing dur khrod
T02D1697:53a-20: mchog / chu 'gram dben pa'i sa phyogs rang bzhin
T02D1697:53a-21: nyams dga' bar // chu gtsang spos kyi chag chag me tog dri zhim gtor //
T02D1697:53a-22: rgyal ba'i sku gzugs dam chos rin chen bzhugs pa dang //
T02D1697:53a-23: me tog bdug spos snang ba dri dang zhal zas
T02D1697:53a-24: mchog / rgyal sras yum dang dkyil 'khor mchod phyir
T02D1697:53a-25: legs bzhag bya // ri dags 'gan 'ji sngon po legs par btags gyur pa'i //
T02D1697:53a-26: stan la 'dug nas bsam gtan bdag gis bsgom par bya //
T02D1697:53a-27: thog mar 'od gsal rten 'brel bde stong mi g-yo ba //
T02D1697:53a-28: gang zhig shar bas spyod pa'i dus na yul rnams dang //
T02D1697:53a-29: dbang po'i tshogs dag rtog bral tshul gyis kun du nub //
T02D1697:53b-0: rtog @53b med rtog bral rdo rje'i mchog 'dzin kun du khyab //
T02D1697:53b-1: ji bzhin rtog pa'i mtha' las rang sems sa bon
T02D1697:53b-2: mchog / zla 'od dkar mdzes t'am las phyogs bcu
T02D1697:53b-3: nam mkha'i mthar // shin tu rno ba'i 'od zer chen pos khams gsum gyi //
T02D1697:53b-4: mun pa'i tshogs bcom rgyal ba sras rnams nam mkha' la //
T02D1697:53b-5: bzhugs par bltas la bdag yid rtse gcig dri med kyi //
T02D1697:53b-6: gang zhig sna tshogs ro gcig dbang po'i gzhu 'dra ba //
T02D1697:53b-7: nyon mongs rdul bral zhi bde spros bral bde 'gro zhing //
T02D1697:53b-8: ye shes rgyun 'bab rgyal ba'i sku mdzes padmo la //
T02D1697:53b-9: gus pa'i tshul gyis mgrin pa smad nas bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1697:53b-10: kha dog sna tshogs dri zhi ma dbyibs mdzes me tog dang //
T02D1697:53b-11: bdug spos aa ga ru dang sbrul gyi snying po dang //
T02D1697:53b-12: snod mdzes rin chen sgron ma snang ba drir bcas dang //
T02D1697:53b-13: chu gtsang dri zhim snying po sbyor ba dpag med dang //
T02D1697:53b-14: mdog bzang ro brgya ldan pa'i zhal zas mang po rnams //
T02D1697:53b-15: gus bcas yid 'ong rgyal sras khyed la 'bul lags kyis //
T02D1697:53b-16: sems can tshogs rnams srid pa'i gdung bzhi bar mdzod //
T02D1697:53b-19: aom badzra a'a lo ke a'a:h'um /
T02D1697:53b-21: aom badzra nee wi tya a'a: h'um /
T02D1697:53b-22: gnod pa byed rnams dge ba'i phyogs las nyams pa dang //
T02D1697:53b-23: sdig pa'i gzhir gyur bsten du mi rung ji snyed las //
T02D1697:53b-24: dug gi sgregs pas sems gdung gyur pa bdag sogs kyi //
T02D1697:53b-25: phra rgyas tshon chen zag pa'i tshang tshing zad par mdzod //
T02D1697:53b-26: gang zhig rgyal sras thub pa'i 'od tshogs mdzes pa'i tshal //
T02D1697:53b-27: 'bras bu smin pa'i ljid kyi zug rdu gnon mdzad cing //
T02D1697:53b-28: snying rje'i rgyun gyis nyon mongs tha ba brlan mdzad pa //
T02D1697:53b-29: dregs pa'i rdul bral skyong ba'i mgon la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1697:53b-30: yang dag lam bral lta ba'i dug gis myos gyur cing //
T02D1697:53b-31: nyon mongs mtsho chen brgal dka'i ngogs su lhung ba rnams //
T02D1697:53b-32: shes rab gzings chen snying rje'i go cha mi 'gyur
T02D1697:53b-33: mchog / dri med yid 'ong zla ba'i mdangs gsal
T02D1697:53b-34: thob par gyis // rab tu zab pa'i dka' thub dpal gyis 'bar ba dang //
T02D1697:53b-35: nyon mongs chags bral byams pa snying rje dga' ba dang //
T02D1697:54a-0: btang snyoms yid brtan rim gro byed @54a * //
T02D1697:54a-1: ba'i bde ba'i mchog / khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' ltar ro gcig bde //
T02D1697:54a-2: bde gshegs byed pa sgyu ma'i yon tan dpag med rnams //
T02D1697:54a-3: srid gsum 'gro ba dbang po'i dri ma sbyong byed pa //
T02D1697:54a-4: rab dga' sems kyi gru chen nam mkha'i dbyings su 'gyur //
T02D1697:54a-5: nyi zla'i sbyor bas mun ba zad 'gyur grong mchog lam //
T02D1697:54a-6: bdud rtsi sgron mi chu gter yid bzhin rin po che //
T02D1697:54a-7: rdul med rdul bral ye shes dbang phyug phyag rgya can //
T02D1697:54a-8: ye shes mthar son sna tshogs lus can kun ston pa //
T02D1697:54a-9: ting 'dzin dag pa'i lus can 'phags ma thob par shog /
T02D1697:54a-10: de nas byams pa snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms bsgom //
T02D1697:54a-11: gdod nas sems ni ma skyes rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba //
T02D1697:54a-12: nges don bdud rtsi nam mkha' las byung dag pa bsten //
T02D1697:54a-13: rtog pa rgyun chad sems nyid de nyid gzhan ma yin //
T02D1697:54a-14: chu tshod thun dang dbyu gu skad cig rim pa med //
T02D1697:54a-15: mi 'jigs sgro skur mi rtsol rgyal sras thu bo ste //
T02D1697:54a-16: gdod nas ma skyes chos rnams byed pa thig le yin //
T02D1697:54a-17: spros bral chos nyid yang dag nyid ni snang ba sa dben //
T02D1697:54a-18: bskyed rdzogs theg pa'i mtha' bral rtog med bde chen po //
T02D1697:54a-19: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konyaham /
T02D1697:54a-20: de nas snying rje'i shugs kyis rab tu bskul gyur nas //
T02D1697:54a-21: rang snying pam las sna tshogs padma de steng a'a: //
T02D1697:54a-22: lte ba zla bas brgyan cing dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi //
T02D1697:54a-23: kun nas bskor ba'i t'am las phyogs bcur 'od tshogs 'phros //
T02D1697:54a-24: 'gro ba'i don byas tshur la bsdus nas t'am la thim //
T02D1697:54a-25: de rnams skad cig nyid la sgrol ma'i sku lngar gyur //
T02D1697:54a-26: sngon mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi stag gi gos gyon ma //
T02D1697:54a-27: gri gug thod pa ral gri sdigs mdzub phyag rgya can //
T02D1697:54a-28: ser mo zhal gsum phyag drug g-yas sngo g-yon pa dmar //
T02D1697:54a-29: ral gri dgra sta mda' dang zhags pa gzhu dang dung //
T02D1697:54a-30: zhal gcig phyag bzhi btsod kyi kha dog sna tshogs brgyan //
T02D1697:54a-31: mi 'jigs mda' dang gzhu dang autpala dmar po bsnams //
T02D1697:54a-32: sku mdog ldang ser chos kyi phyag rgyas thugs ka ru //
T02D1697:54a-33: autpala sngo 'dzin shar sogs go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D1697:54a-34: sna tshogs rgyan ldan phyogs rnams sreg cing gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D1697:54b-0: rnam snang la @54b sogs rgyal po'i rigs kyis dbu brgyan pa //
T02D1697:54b-1: nu ma rgyas shing mi 'jigs phyag dang autpala 'dzin //
T02D1697:54b-2: brtson pa'i lus ldan zla ba'i mdangs can dbus su bsam //
T02D1697:54b-3: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re ni shthi d'a
T02D1697:54b-4: ra na pra ti ha ta tstt'a ausham ha na
T02D1697:54b-5: sv'a h'a / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re
T02D1697:54b-6: bha ya ha ra na raksha ba ra ne gu
T02D1697:54b-7: ba tim biddhya sa ma he sv'a h'a /
T02D1697:54b-8: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa na bhi
T02D1697:54b-9: pradzny'a pra sannat aa bhi pradzny'a pra s'a dha sv'a
T02D1697:54b-10: h'a / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re bha
T02D1697:54b-11: ya ha ra na h'um h'um h'um mrityu danda ya
T02D1697:54b-13: de ltar gsang sngags bzlas pa'i 'od kyis phyogs khyab cing //
T02D1697:54b-14: gzungs kyi snying po mthu chen 'di yang brjod par bya //
T02D1697:54b-15: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D1697:54b-16: na ma: a'ary'a wa lo ki te shva ra ya /
T02D1697:54b-19: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02D1697:54b-21: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba du sht'a
T02D1697:54b-22: na pra du sht'a na ma ma kri te dzam
T02D1697:54b-26: h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02D1697:54b-27: sarba du sht'a stam bha na t'a re sv'a h'a /
T02D1697:54b-28: mang du bzlas la stobs bskyed cho ga 'di ltar bsam //
T02D1697:54b-29: snod mdzes nang du 'bras sogs kha zas bzang po rnams //
T02D1697:54b-30: mngon par bshams pa'i cha gnyis padma kha bye ba'i //
T02D1697:54b-31: phyag rgya bcing zhing sku gsung thugs kyi snying po
T02D1697:54b-32: mchog / lan bdun brjod pas kha dog dri ro
T02D1697:54b-33: phun sum tshogs // aom na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am ;
T02D1697:54b-34: aa pra ti ha ta sh'a sa n'a n'am /
T02D1697:54b-35: he he bha ga ba ti me sa d'a sarba buddha a'a ba lo ki te /
T02D1697:54b-36: ai dam pa lim gri hna grihna /
T02D1697:54b-37: aa mri ta kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D1697:54b-38: tishthi tishtha h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1697:54b-39: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'a
T02D1697:54b-40: a'adya nutpanna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D1697:54b-41: / aom aa mri ta kha kha kh'a ti kh'a hi tishthi tishtha /
T02D1697:54b-46: pi spho ta ya bi spho ta ya /
T02D1697:54b-47: sarba bi ghn'am bi n'a ya /
T02D1697:54b-48: ma h'a ga na pa ti dz'i wi t'anta ka
T02D1697:54b-49: r'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a
T02D1697:54b-50: / dpag med cha gcig rig pa'i lha mo rnams la 'bul //
T02D1697:54b-51: cha gcig nang du 'od zer sbu gu bskyed byas te //
T02D1697:54b-52: nag po chen po tha skar dbyig gi snying po dang //
T02D1697:54b-53: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin grul bum tshogs rnams la //
T02D1697:54b-54: 'dod pa'i gsol ba btab cing gus pas dbul bar bya //
T02D1697:54b-55: brgyad dang bcu bzhi bcu dang nyi shu gsum rnams la //
T02D1697:54b-56: zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang mngon spyod sbyin sreg dbul //
T02D1697:55a-1: dang nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02D1697:55a-2: rtse khru gcig dang gcig dang phyed dang rtse khru
T02D1697:55a-3: gcig / zlum dang gru bzhi zla gam gru gsum
T02D1697:55a-4: bri bar bya // thams cad sor bzhi bskyed cing 'od phreng phyi rol bri //
T02D1697:55a-5: 'khor lo dkar dang sna tshogs rdo rje ser po dang //
T02D1697:55a-6: padma dmar dang gri gug sngon po thabs rnams kyi //
T02D1697:55a-7: rim pa ji bzhin legs par nang du dgod par bya //
T02D1697:55a-8: mar dang zho dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi ka ra dang //
T02D1697:55a-9: 'bras til gro dang nas sogs 'bru yi rnam pa dang //
T02D1697:55a-10: d'ur ba ku sha la sogs cho ga gzhan bzhin bsogs //
T02D1697:55a-11: de las gzhan pa'i sreg rdzas khyad par mang po rnams //
T02D1697:55a-12: nye bar bshams la thog mar drang srong me lha
T02D1697:55a-13: mchog / zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog dkar po
T02D1697:55a-14: tshangs skud can // dbyug pa spyi blugs bgrang phreng mi 'jigs phyag rgya can //
T02D1697:55a-15: ral pa'i cod pan dka' thub lus ring zla ba'i steng //
T02D1697:55a-16: mngon par bskyed la dgang blugs bdun gyis rab tu mchod //
T02D1697:55a-17: dza: zhes brjod cing se gol gtogs la gshegs par bsam //
T02D1697:55a-18: aom bahni r'a dzny'a pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1697:55a-19: de nas rdzas dang me thab dri chab bzang pos bsang //
T02D1697:55a-20: aom bro ksh'a li bi shuddhe sv'a h'a /
T02D1697:55a-21: mchod pa'i yo byad snying po'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya //
T02D1697:55a-22: mnyes par gyur nas smon lam btab cing mi snang bsgom //
T02D1697:55a-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig sems can skyong //
T02D1697:55a-24: ched du brjod la lus ngag yid gsum gyi /
T02D1697:55a-25: spyod lam khyad par can gyis gnas bya zhing //
T02D1697:55a-26: de las gzhan pa'i bsod nams mang po bsags //
T02D1697:55a-27: drang srong tshe 'dzin bla ma'i gsung snyan bdag la bsnyad gyur pa //
T02D1697:55a-28: byang chub myu gu'i phreng bas lus brgyan gzhan don 'brug sgra sgrogs //
T02D1697:55a-29: snying rje'i shugs kyis bsod nams sprin chen grags pa'i char rgyun gyis //
T02D1697:55a-30: nyon mongs 'khrugs pa'i me chen rab tu bsil bar
T02D1697:55a-31: byed par shog / me tog phreng 'dzin sgrol ma'i
T02D1697:55a-32: sgrub thabs 'phags pa 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis byin gyis
T02D1697:55a-33: brlab pa panti ta chen po ta tha' ga t'a
T02D1697:55a-34: ra kshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
